Detailed Description

template<class T_Container>
class ValueMappingPropertyDescriptor< T_Container >

A ValueMappingPropertyDescriptor holds a container of text icon pairs and a MappingPolicy. Depending on the MappingPolicy and the property's value, the ValueMappingPropertyDescriptor returns the matching text icon pair from the container.
